title: Ahmedabad Heritage & Culture Tour
description: Explore the rich heritage of India's first UNESCO World Heritage City with visits to iconic monuments, traditional markets, and cultural experiences.

activities.description: Start your day with authentic Gujarati breakfast including Fafda-Jalebi, Thepla, or Dhokla.
Explore the former residence of Mahatma Gandhi and learn about India's independence movement.
Enjoy traditional Gujarati thali at this heritage hotel restaurant.
Visit the famous mosque known for its intricate jali work and the historic Bhadra Fort.
Shop for traditional Gujarati handicrafts, textiles, and garments.
Experience local cuisine and traditional folk performances.
Start your day with a hearty breakfast.
Visit the magnificent five-story stepwell with intricate carvings dating back to 1498.
Try local specialties like Undhiyu or Khichdi-Kadhi.
Enjoy boating, visit the zoo, or take a ride on the toy train around this historic lake.
Stroll along the beautifully developed riverfront and enjoy the sunset views.

activities.activity: Night food walk at Manek Chowk
activities.description: Experience the vibrant night food market offering a variety of local street food.
Take a guided walk through the old city's traditional housing clusters known as 'pols'.
Enjoy local breakfast at a heritage cafe in the old city.
Explore one of the finest textile museums in the world (prior booking required).
Experience rooftop dining with authentic Gujarati cuisine.
Visit this unique museum showcasing vintage cars and other automobiles.

activities.activity: Shopping and dinner at Alpha One Mall
activities.description: End your Ahmedabad tour with shopping and dinner at this modern mall.

addons.name: Private Heritage Walk Guide
addons.description: Exclusive expert guide for the heritage walk through the old city pols

addons.name: Traditional Cooking Class
addons.description: Learn to cook authentic Gujarati dishes with a local family

addons.name: Textile Workshop
addons.description: Hands-on workshop learning traditional block printing techniques

title: Kutch White Desert & Cultural Safari
description: Experience the magical White Rann of Kutch with traditional craft villages, stunning desert landscapes, and authentic cultural encounters.

activities.description: Start your day with local Kutchi breakfast specialties.
Visit these magnificent palaces with unique architecture and historical artifacts.
Try traditional Kutchi cuisine with its unique flavors.
Explore Gujarat's oldest museum with artifacts showcasing Kutch's rich heritage.
Visit this crafts village famous for its handloom weaving and block printing.
Enjoy local cuisine with traditional Kutchi folk music and dance performances.
Start your day with a hearty breakfast.
Experience panoramic views of the Great Rann from the highest point in Kutch.
Enjoy lunch with views of the surrounding landscape.
Experience the vast salt marsh that stretches endlessly towards the horizon.
Witness the magical sunset over the white desert with changing hues.

activities.activity: Dinner at Rann Utsav tent city
activities.description: Experience dining under the stars with cultural performances (seasonal).
Start your day with local breakfast items.
Witness the unique Rogan Art and copper bell making traditions.
Experience the colorful huts and exquisite embroidery work by local artisans.
Enjoy homemade Kutchi cuisine with a local family.
Travel to the coastal town of Mandvi known for its beach and shipbuilding yard.
Visit the summer palace of Kutch royals and enjoy the clean beach.
Farewell dinner with Kutchi specialties.

addons.name: Full Moon Night at White Rann
addons.description: Special experience of the White Rann under the full moon with dinner

addons.name: Camel Cart Safari
addons.description: Traditional camel cart ride through villages and desert landscapes

addons.name: Embroidery Workshop
addons.description: Learn traditional Kutchi embroidery techniques from master artisans

title: Gir National Park Wildlife Safari
description: Embark on an exciting wildlife adventure to spot the majestic Asiatic lions in their natural habitat along with diverse flora and fauna.

activities.description: Arrive and check in at your safari lodge or resort near Gir National Park.
Enjoy local Saurashtra cuisine at the resort restaurant.
Visit the interpretation zone to learn about Gir's ecosystem and conservation efforts.
Take a guided walk to observe birds and understand the local flora.
Enjoy dinner followed by a documentary on Asiatic lions and Gir conservation.
Early morning jeep safari into Gir National Park for the best wildlife sightings.
Return for a hearty breakfast and relaxation.
Explore this reservoir where wildlife congregates during summer.
Enjoy lunch and afternoon rest.
Second safari into different zones of the national park.
Experience unique African-origin tribal dance performance while dining.
Early morning guided walk focusing on bird species and smaller fauna.
Enjoy a leisurely breakfast.
Interact with the traditional pastoralist community who coexist with lions.
Explore this ancient temple nestled within the forest.
Final lunch followed by check-out and departure.

addons.name: Private Safari Vehicle
addons.description: Exclusive jeep safari with expert naturalist guide

addons.name: Wildlife Photography Workshop
addons.description: Half-day workshop with professional wildlife photographer

addons.name: Sasan Gir Night Stay
addons.description: Overnight stay in forest guest house (subject to availability)

title: Dwarka Spiritual & Coastal Journey
description: Discover the sacred city of Dwarka with temple visits, spiritual experiences, and beautiful coastal scenery including the mystical Beyt Dwarka island.

activities.description: Start your day with local Gujarati breakfast.
Visit the magnificent temple dedicated to Lord Krishna with morning rituals.
Enjoy traditional sattvic (pure vegetarian) food.
Visit the sacred ghat where river Gomti meets the Arabian Sea.
Visit this ancient temple dedicated to Krishna's consort Rukmini.
Experience the elaborate evening prayer ceremony with music and rituals.
Dinner followed by relaxation.
Early breakfast to prepare for day trip.
Take a boat to this sacred island believed to be Krishna's residence.
Visit various temples on the island including Krishna's residence.
Try local coastal cuisine specialties.
Boat journey back to Dwarka.
Visit one of the twelve sacred Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva.
Witness the beautiful sunset at the beach.
Enjoy traditional Gujarati dinner with folk music performance.
Experience the spiritual morning prayer ceremony.
Enjoy breakfast at leisure.
Visit this protected marine sanctuary with diverse marine life.
Enjoy fresh seafood or vegetarian coastal cuisine.
Buy local handicrafts, religious items, and seashell artifacts.
Final visit to Dwarkadhish Temple before departure.

addons.name: Private Temple Guide
addons.description: Expert guide explaining the mythology and significance of temples

addons.name: Underwater Dwarka Exploration
addons.description: Boat trip with glass bottom to view submerged ancient city remains

addons.name: Okha Lighthouse Visit
addons.description: Special permission visit to the lighthouse with panoramic views
